transcribe.title: Video Transcription
transcribe.subtitle: Upload a video file and get an accurate text transcription using OpenAI Whisper
transcribe.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a video file here, or click to select. Large files will be automatically split into chunks for processing. Supported formats: MP4, MP3, WAV, M4A, and more.
transcribe.resultDescription: Your video has been successfully transcribed
transcribe.fileTooLarge: Please select a video file first
transcribe.passkeyRequired: Please enter the passkey to continue
transcribe.passkeyDescription: Enter the required passkey to access the transcription service
transcribe.invalidFile: Please drop a valid video or audio file

hero.title: RubyTech Studio
hero.subtitle: Transform Your Ideas Into Reality
hero.description: Delivering scalable, professional full-stack solutions tailored to your business needs

process.title: Development Process
process.subtitle: Transparent, collaborative approach ensuring your vision becomes reality

consultation.title: Initial Consultation
consultation.description: We discuss your project goals, requirements, and timeline. I'll provide technical insights and feasibility analysis to ensure we're aligned.

proposal.title: Proposal & Planning
proposal.description: Receive a detailed proposal including system architecture, technology stack, timeline, and pricing. We'll refine the plan together until you're confident.

development.title: Iterative Development
development.description: Development happens in sprints with regular progress reports. You'll see working prototypes early and often, with opportunities for feedback at every stage.

testing.title: Testing & Refinement
testing.description: Comprehensive testing ensures quality and performance. We'll gather your feedback and make refinements to perfect the deliverable.

deployment.title: Deployment & Training
deployment.description: Smooth deployment to production with documentation and training. I'll ensure your team is comfortable with the system.

support.title: Ongoing Support
support.description: Continuous maintenance and technical support available. I'm here to help your product grow and evolve with your business needs.

contact.title: Let's Build Something Great Together
contact.subtitle: Ready to start your project? Get in touch and let's discuss how I can help bring your vision to life.
contact.whatToInclude: What to Include in Your Message:
